/* eslint-disable indent */import AwTextareaVal from'viewmodel/AwTextareaValViewModel';import AwIntegerVal from'viewmodel/AwIntegerValViewModel';import AwDateTimeVal from'viewmodel/AwDateTimeValViewModel';import AwDoubleVal from'viewmodel/AwDoubleValViewModel';import AwPropertyStringVal from'viewmodel/AwPropertyStringValViewModel';import AwToggleButtonVal from'viewmodel/AwToggleButtonValViewModel';import AwRadioButtonVal from'viewmodel/AwRadiobuttonValViewModel';import AwCheckBoxVal from'viewmodel/AwCheckboxValViewModel';import AwPropertyObjectVal from'viewmodel/AwPropertyObjectValViewModel';import{getValClass}from'js/componentUtils';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const renderWidgetBasedOnTypex=prop=>{switch(prop.typex){case'DOUBLEARRAY':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AwDoubleVal,{...prop,className:getValClass(prop)});case'DATEARRAY':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AwDateTimeVal,{...prop,className:getValClass(prop)});case'INTEGERARRAY':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AwIntegerVal,{...prop,className:getValClass(prop)});case'STRINGARRAY':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AwPropertyStringVal,{...prop,className:getValClass(prop)});case'BOOLEANARRAY':if(prop.fielddata.renderingHint==='radiobutton'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AwRadioButtonVal,{prop:prop,className:getValClass(prop)});}else if(prop.fielddata.renderingHint==='togglebutton'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AwToggleButtonVal,{...prop,className:getValClass(prop)});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AwCheckBoxVal,{className:getValClass(prop),...prop});case'OBJECTARRAY':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AwPropertyObjectVal,{...prop,className:getValClass(prop)});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AwTextareaVal,{...prop,className:getValClass(prop)});}};export const awPropertyArrayEditValRenderFunction=props=>{const{viewModel,ctxMin,actions,i18n,fields,grids,formProp,messages,...prop}=props;return renderWidgetBasedOnTypex(prop);};
